titleStmt.title: Raglands Niobe: or, Elizas elegie Addressed to the unexpiring memory of the most noble Lady, Elizabeth Herbert, wife to the truly honourable, Edward Somerset Lord Herbert, &c. By Ri. Brathwait, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by F. K[ingston] for Robert Bostocke, at the Kings head in Saint Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
The first and last leaves are blank.
Identifed as STC 3562 on UMI reel 1447.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Kings head in Saint Paul's Church-yard
